name: Drillo
description:
Welcome to my first game ever, Drillo!

This is a Top Down 2-d Dungeon Crawler where you and your friend Drillo go spelunking through caves in order to find the shiny Soul Coins! 


This is the first game I've ever completed, and all the art, coding, music, and sound effects were made by myself. (except the monster hit sound: kenny_impactsounds).


Controls:

          Mouse Cursor - Controls cursor around player.

          Left Click - Sends out a flash of light to knock any nearby objects or monsters away.

          Hold Space Bar - Send Drillo to dig a hole where cursor was. (Don't fall in!)

          W-A-S-D - Move up, down, left and right.


Thanks for playing!

-Btmodz
